name: Glitch Figma Viewer Helper
description:
This is a helper companion for my Figma Viewer Glitch projects, which allow you to embed a Figma prototype viewer into a glitch app you can share anywhere on the web without Figma UI getting in the way.


As an added bonus, If you bookmark the link in Safari on iOS devices the viewer will have a custom app icon: you can use this community template to export image assets to customize it. You can also use it to export meta image assets for link unfurls when you share using the public version of the Figma viewer.


The Figma viewer glitch projects are available to be remixed on Glitch:


Remix the public viewer


Remix the password protected private viewer
